Bluesky embed conversion Phase 2: resolve post and populate CID
description:
When converting a Bluesky URL to a social.coves.embed.post, we need to:

1. Call blueskyService.ResolvePost() to get the full post data including CID
2. Populate both URI and CID in the strongRef
3. Consider caching/re-using resolved post data for rendering

Currently disabled in Phase 1 (text-only) because:
- social.coves.embed.post requires a valid CID in com.atproto.repo.strongRef
- Empty CID causes PDS to reject the record creation

Related files:
- internal/core/posts/service.go:tryConvertBlueskyURLToPostEmbed()
- internal/atproto/lexicon/social/coves/embed/post.json

This is part of the Bluesky post cross-posting feature (images/embeds phase).
